title: A Day of Stewf
content:
Y'all know it's that time of the year again! All hail the [Original Typographicalist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207/http:/www.typographica.org/), the [Fontalicious Identifier](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207/http:/typophile.com/forum/29), the [Feeder of Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/), the [Referencer of The Cross](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207/http:/stewf.blogs.com/stewflog/2006/09/fondling_fontbo.html)! Testify!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Stewfday_5279.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

Multiplicitous Mirthful Moments on this Felicitous Festival of Fontasmic Folly! A Garrulous Greeting of Gargantuan Glee! Turgid Testimonials of Tempestuous Tantalization! May your cup spilleth repeatedly in the limousine of life.

**1 New Message**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wish_6024.jpg)

May you find many a Malurus cyaneus on this your day of birth! All of my best to you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stewfsday_5312.gif)

Couldn't resist using [Blaktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=581) cranked up to 11 (all features activated!)
Happy birthday Stewfers. No online graphic gifts, but something special when I see you this evening. Interesting how nobody mentions your actual age. Your eternal youth confuses.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010223207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stewf_birthday_3972.jpg)

If we weren't having German this evening, I'd buy you a mojito. However, you may have to settle for a boot full of pilsner - can you handle it?

Best wishes, and welcome to the wonderful world of being 30.

Happy birthday Stewf!

(But remember, even though it seems like you're aging quickly, you aren't going to be able to catch me!)

Cheers,

T
